title: Wikipedia API
description: In this coding challenge, I make a "Wikipedia web crawler" in JavaScript. It randomly crawls from topic to topic on Wikipedia using the API and the p5.js library.

Look at the json file with the Chrome extension Json formator
Use the key to get the page Id

Use a random word to crawl a bunch of random articles
